channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: Friday Funnies: An Honest Trailer for Star Trek
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description:
Star Trek fans have had a lot of criticism and applause for the 2009 reboot of Star Trek by J. J. Abrams. In defense of J. J. there’s no way he could make everyone happy, so I believe he went more »

Read more →
item.content:encoded: Star Trek fans have had a lot of criticism and applause for the 2009 reboot of Star Trek by J. J. Abrams. In defense of J. J. there’s no way he could make everyone happy, so I believe he went with the most intelligent approach, make Star Trek enjoyable for the mainstream audience. In defense of the fans, WHAT THE HECK MAN? It’s like you blew the whole Star Trek franchise out one of Gallactica’s launch tubes! I mean, the Okuda’s are going to have to completely rewrite the entire encyclopedia. OK, I’ve geeked out enough. Here’s what the movie trailer for Star Trek would have been like if it had been just a bit more honest. Enjoy the video.

item.title: Ridiculous Sherlock [VIDEO] – Friday Funnies
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description:
YouTube user mah81164 may have just single-handedly created one of the best arguments for the fair use provision of copyright law. Admittedly, this video may not be as funny for you if you are not a fan of Sherlock, Toby Turner and more »

Read more →
item.content:encoded:
YouTube user mah81164 may have just single-handedly created one of the best arguments for the fair use provision of copyright law. Admittedly, this video may not be as funny for you if you are not a fan of Sherlock, Toby Turner and Dumb and Dumber. Also, if you are not a fan of Sherlock, I disown you. If you’re not a fan of Dumb and Dumber, well, who can blame you?

P.S. The best part starts at 3:44. Click here to see more Friday Funnies.

item.title: How Do You Wash Your Hands In Space? [VIDEO] Friday Funnies
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description:
It’s been a couple of weeks since we did a Friday Funnies article here on Deemable Tech. This week’s isn’t hilarious, as much as it is just plain fun. Have you ever wondered how astronauts wash their hands in space? Me more »

Read more →
item.content:encoded:
It’s been a couple of weeks since we did a Friday Funnies article here on Deemable Tech. This week’s isn’t hilarious, as much as it is just plain fun. Have you ever wondered how astronauts wash their hands in space? Me neither! I’ve wondered about how astronauts do almost every other bodily function in space, but it never crossed my mind to think about cleaning up. I’m not sure what that says about me. Regardless, here’s Canadian Astronaut Chris Hadfield on the International Space Station demonstrating how they do it.

BONUS! Here’s how astronauts wash their hair and their clothes. (SPOILER: THEY DON’T WASH THEIR CLOTHES!!)

item.title: Best Pep Talk Ever [VIDEO] Friday Funnies
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description:
There’s something about the unbridled enthusiasm of youth that can make you feel like you can do anything. Favorite quotes: “The world needs you to stop being boring… Yeah, you!” and “Not cool, Robert Frost!” And my absolute favorite, “It’s more »

Read more →
item.content:encoded: There’s something about the unbridled enthusiasm of youth that can make you feel like you can do anything. Favorite quotes: “The world needs you to stop being boring… Yeah, you!” and “Not cool, Robert Frost!” And my absolute favorite, “It’s like that dude Journey says…” Nah, never mind. I won’t ruin it for you. Just watch.

item.title: Live Action Toy Story [VIDEO] Friday Funnies
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description:
I’ve seen all three Toy Story movies. (I definitely cried during Toy Story 3. Once during the trash scene. Once when Andy was saying goodbye.) I’ve seen all of the Toy Story shorts films. I’ve ridden both of the Toy more »

Read more →
item.content:encoded: I’ve seen all three Toy Story movies. (I definitely cried during Toy Story 3. Once during the trash scene. Once when Andy was saying goodbye.) I’ve seen all of the Toy Story shorts films. I’ve ridden both of the Toy Story rides at Walt Disney World several times. My daughter owns full-size, talking Woody, Buzz and Jessie dolls. I thought I was a fan. But unlike these folks, I never thought to recreate a full length live action version of Toy Story. There is something amazing about this. I can’t imagine how much time and dedication it took to create an hour and twenty minutes worth of video that is almost exactly the same as the movie, frame by frame. I am ashamed of myself.

item.title: Schadenfreude [VIDEO] Friday Funnies
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description:
Schadenfreude: pleasure derived from the misfortune of others. Whether we’d like to admit it or not, it is sometimes really funny to watch someone else get hurt, especially if they were in the middle of doing something remarkably stupid. Whether more »

Read more →
item.content:encoded: Schadenfreude: pleasure derived from the misfortune of others. Whether we’d like to admit it or not, it is sometimes really funny to watch someone else get hurt, especially if they were in the middle of doing something remarkably stupid. Whether it was called slapstick or physical comedy, Schadenfreude has been a part of humor since the dawn of humanity. Comedians are great at faking it, but the funniest Schadenfreude has always been watching real people make really dumb decisions. In the old days, the only place you could watch videos like this were on America’s Funniest Home Videos. Nowadays, anyone with a smart phone can upload your humiliation to YouTube within seconds, and let the whole world laugh at you. On the Internet, we don’t call them Schadenfreude ; we just call them fail videos. Here’s a few examples of the funniest fails of 2012. Caution, contains some strong language, and plenty of painful falls.

item.title: What Are You Doing New Years Eve? – [VIDEO] Friday Funnies
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description:
Haven’t you ever wished that Tom and Summer from (500) Days of Summer would sit down and sing a duet of “What Are You Doing New Year’s Eve” while playing guitar and the ukulele? If that’s you, here’s Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Zooey Deschanel signing more »

Read more →
item.content:encoded: Haven’t you ever wished that Tom and Summer from (500) Days of Summer would sit down and sing a duet of “What Are You Doing New Year’s Eve” while playing guitar and the ukulele? If that’s you, here’s Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Zooey Deschanel signing one of the lesser known holiday songs. Happy New Year from Deemable Tech!

item.title: Sexy Dictators [VIDEO] – Friday Funnies
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description:
parody = ???? satire = ?? spoof = ?? Assuming that Google translated these words correctly into Chinese, if you are a journalist in China, you should know the meaning of these words. Sometimes important details get lost in translation. Sometimes, more »

Read more →
item.content:encoded:
parody = ????
satire = ??
spoof = ??

Assuming that Google translated these words correctly into Chinese, if you are a journalist in China, you should know the meaning of these words. Sometimes important details get lost in translation. Sometimes, different cultures just don’t understand each others humor. Apparently, that’s what happened to a Chinese newspaper when the satirical news website, The Onion, named the supreme leader of North Korea, Kim Jung-un, as their 2012 Sexiest Man Alive.

item.title: The Earliest Black Friday Ever [VIDEO] – Friday Funnies
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description:
Well, Black Friday is coming early this year, but Rebecca Tyler (Teri Hatcher) isn’t going to let that stop her from getting her family the best doorbuster deals this holiday season. She’s a little fired up about it, too. After more »

Read more →
item.content:encoded:
Well, Black Friday is coming early this year, but Rebecca Tyler (Teri Hatcher) isn’t going to let that stop her from getting her family the best doorbuster deals this holiday season. She’s a little fired up about it, too. After the video, tell us in the comments below, did you go out shopping on Thanksgiving? What did you get?

Black Friday Thanksgiving from Teri Hatcher

item.title: What’s 9 + 1 + 1? [VIDEO] Friday Funnies
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description:
Every parent in the United States should teach their kid at some point in their childhood how to use 911 (In other countries it’s 999, 000, 110, 112, and others) to make sure that their son or daughter knows how to call for more »

Read more →
item.content:encoded: Every parent in the United States should teach their kid at some point in their childhood how to use 911 (In other countries it’s 999, 000, 110, 112, and others) to make sure that their son or daughter knows how to call for help in the case of an emergency.  However, sometimes a parent needs to make sure their children knows the difference between what is an emergency worth calling the cops about, and what’s just going to embarrass them when the cops show up.

item.title: Star Trek: The Next Humiliation [VIDEOS] Friday Funnies
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description:
After working closely together for seven years on television, producing four movies together over another eight years, and even cutting a record together, it shouldn’t be surprising that the cast of Star Trek: The Next Generation has a close enough relationship more »

Read more →
item.content:encoded:
After working closely together for seven years on television, producing four movies together over another eight years, and even cutting a record together, it shouldn’t be surprising that the cast of Star Trek: The Next Generation has a close enough relationship with each other that they can have a lot of fun pestering and irritating each other. Here’s a few of the best pranks that they’ve pulled on each other and a couple of good impressions and stories. Oh, and one cross show jab from Aaron Douglas, Chief Tyrol from Battlestar Galactica, and then a sincere moment with Wil Wheaton talking about when he left the show.

Brent Spiner crashes Patrick Stewart’s Q&A panel

Sir Patrick Stewart heckling Brent Spiner

Brent Spiner impersonating Patrick Stewart

Brent Spiner imitates Patrick Stewart… again.

Brent Spiner, Jonathan Frakes & Michael Dorn answer funny opening questions.

Michael Dorn tells a funny Patrick Stewart story

Wil Wheaton on leaving TNG, with entire cast, question from Aaron Douglas

BONUS: A Ricker Sitcom???!!!

item.title: Laughing at Politicians [VIDEOS] Friday Funnies
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description:
Both the Republican and the Democratic candidates for President have said that they want to grow the U.S. economy, and they have been doing that throughout this campaign. If it seems like the airwaves and the Internet have been filled more »

Read more →
item.content:encoded:
Both the Republican and the Democratic candidates for President have said that they want to grow the U.S. economy, and they have been doing that throughout this campaign. If it seems like the airwaves and the Internet have been filled with nothing but policital ads for the past few months, it’s because that’s mostly true. Both campaigns, and the super PACS that support them, have purchased a combined $900 million worth of ads! That’s $300 million more than at the same time in 2008. If the current rate of spending remains the same, they will likely surpass $1 billion in ad spending for the first time in history. For the states that are getting the majority of the ads, Ohio, Florida, Virginia, Colorado, Iowa, and North Carolina, this is a much needed infusion of cash into their state’s economy.

But, with the final days of the campaigns winding down, folks on both side of the aisle are getting tired of the mixed messages from both campaigns of hope, prosperity, fear and worry. So, regardless of who you want to be president, let’s have a laugh. Below are a collection of the funniest videos we could find about the 2012 presidential campaign. If you found any funny ones we missed, feel free to put a link to them in the comments below.

Patriot Game – OBAMA VS ROMNEY VIDEO GAME!

Debate Highlights Songified!

VP Debate Highlights Songified

Town Hall Debate Songified

FINAL DEBATE SONGIFIED! The Requiem Politicus Disputationem

“Eye Of The Sparrow” ? A Bad Lip Reading of the First 2012 Presidential Debate

Whedon On Romney

Epic Rap Battles Barack Obama vs Mitt Romney.

You Didn’t Build That – Barack Obama raps about “You Didn’t Build That” to the tune of MC Hammer’s “U Can’t Touch This”.

Will The Real Mitt Romney Please Stand Up – Mitt Romney raps to the tune of Eminem’s The Real Slim Shady.

item.title: Catch the Ice Dude [VIDEO] Friday Funnies
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description:
This one will definitely crack you up. Sometimes when you have a stupid idea, you don’t realize how stupid the idea truly is until you implement it. At least he didn’t have to go far to find ice to apply more »

Read more →
item.content:encoded:
This one will definitely crack you up. Sometimes when you have a stupid idea, you don’t realize how stupid the idea truly is until you implement it. At least he didn’t have to go far to find ice to apply to the injury to help reduce the swelling!

WARNING EXPLICIT LANGUAGE: Even though the video is in German, there is some very strong, explicit language in English. Turn the volume off if explicit language offends you. It’s still hilarious on mute.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zd7c5tQCs1I
